name: The Space Wanderer
description:
FULL SCREEN HIGHLY RECOMENDED!

Control the player's movements with space key or tap. Keeping in mind the amount of energy left, crash through asteroids to collect coins so that, later in the home screen you can buy essentials like Missiles (10 on each buy), Coin Doubler (Increases how much each coins represent), and Asteroid Crash Energy Saver (Applied for 30 asteroids, it prevents loss of energy while crashing through asteroids. During journeys, to boost your energy, pass through stars to increase your energy by 3. You can also use missile by tapping the button at the bottom right or pressing the 'c' key!

PLEASE LEAVE A COMMENT ABOUT HOW MUCH YOU ENJOYED!

THANKS AND HOPE YOU ENJOY!
